sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnleaderschdulde ( SCHDUL_ID , schdul_de ) VALUES ( #schdulId# , #schdulDe# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnleaderschdulde SET schdul_id = #schdulId# , schdul_de = #schdulDe# WHERE schdul_id = #schdulId# AND schdul_de = #schdulDe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnleaderschdulde WHERE schdul_id = #schdulId# AND schdul_de = #schdulDe#
sqlMap.select: SELECT schdul_id , schdul_de FROM comtnleaderschdulde WHERE schdul_id = #schdulId# AND schdul_de = #schdulDe#

SELECT schdul_id , schdul_de FROM comtnleaderschdulde WHERE 1=1
schdul_id = #searchKeyword#
schdul_de LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY schdul_id DESC , schdul_de DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnleaderschdulde WHERE 1=1
schdul_id = #searchKeyword#
schdul_de LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
